name: Mr. Frog Went A-Courting
summary: This short was shown in between children's programs when i was very young,(late eighties) i always loved it, i came upon the description of it when searching for something else completely, its so weird i totally remember what it looked like and the music "mr. frog went a courting and he did ride mm-hmmm mm-hmmm!" i always hated the part when miss.mouses' father tells her to stay away from the frog.
info:
• 中文名: 青蛙先生求婚记
  • 上映年度: 1974
  • 片长: 4:23
  • 制片国家/地区: 加拿大
  • 导演: Evelyn Lambart
